Resume

Experience

Java Full Stack Developer

Ford Pro

As a full-stack developer at Ford Pro, I enable a massive ecosystem, supporting around 160,000 users across 34,000+ companies with our platform. We provide access, modification, and enrollment for 9 million+ vehicles, utilizing modern technologies to build scalable and reliable solutions. I'm focused on delivering exceptional user experiences and driving business value, driving the future of commercial vehicle management.

June 2022 - Present

Software Developer

CGI

I honed my full-stack development skills by building an XML validator tool from scratch. Utilizing Angular on the front-end and Spring Boot on the back-end, I designed and implemented a robust solution to ensure data integrity and compliance. This project provided valuable experience in all stages of the software development lifecycle, from requirements gathering to deployment and testing.

August 2020 - August 2021

Angular Development Intern

CognitiveBotics

I contributed to the development of impactful tools for autism spectrum disorder (ASD) intervention. I designed and developed user interfaces, created engaging games for mental development, and implemented features to track patient progress medically. Additionally, I played a role in developing an interactive chatbot to support these efforts. This experience solidified my passion for using technology to improve lives.

October 2019 - May 2020

Interests

My approach to life, much like my approach to coding, involves a healthy dose of experimentation. As a full-stack developer, I'm constantly seeking elegant solutions to complex problems. But when I step away from the keyboard, I find joy in the art of Indian cooking, meticulously crafting dishes with the same precision and creativity I apply to my code.

I'm always eager to learn and explore new ideas, and I find that evening walks provide the perfect setting for contemplation and inspiration. Naturally, I'm a huge dog enthusiast – their unwavering loyalty and playful spirit remind me to embrace life's simple pleasures.
